TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract EmailAdapterObject implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.SemiTrust.EmailAdapter

Docs.summary: Represents the data adapter for submitting form information in e-mail by using Microsoft Office Outlook.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. Use this type to access the members of the COM interface implemented by this coclass. For information about the COM interface, including a link to descriptions of its members, see.

Use the property of the collection to return an EmailAdapterObject object. Before you can access and use the properties and methods of the EmailAdapterObject, you must cast the object returned from the DataAdaptersCollection to the EmailAdapterObject type.

example.para: The following example retrieves an EmailAdapter object that represents the data connection named "Email Submit" from the DataAdaptersCollection object, sets the and property, and then submits the current form to the data connection.
example.code: EmailAdapterObject myEmailAdapter = ((EmailAdapterObject)thisXDocument.DataAdapters["Email Submit"]); myEmailAdapter.To = "list@example.com"; myEmailAdapter.Subject = "Status Report"; myEmailAdapter.Submit();

Dim myEmailAdapter As EmailAdapterObject = _ DirectCast(thisXDocument.DataAdapters("Email Submit"), _ EmailAdapterObject); myEmailAdapter.To = "list@example.com" myEmailAdapter.Subject = "Status Report" myEmailAdapter.Submit()
